The video released by The Center for Med: Deborah Nucatola admitting to the illegal sale of tissue from aborted fetuses.
Dr: Deborah Nucatola has been employed by Planned Parenthood for over a decade and serves as the senior director of medical services, overseeing medical practices at all Planned Parenthood affiliates nationwide.
The video claims to capture a conversati: where Dr. Nucatola discussed how organs were preserved during the abortion process with the intention of later sale.
The authenticity of the video is questio: the inclusion of old footage of Planned Parenthood president Gloria Feldt condemning "inappropriate behavior," and the reference to a previous investigation into alleged abuses by private sector tissue and organ procurement companies.
